remarks:
Closure law for addition of complex numbers.  Axiom 4 of 22 for real and complex numbers, justified by theorem ~ axaddcl .  Proofs should normally use ~ addcl instead, which asserts the same thing but follows our naming conventions for closures.  (New usage is discouraged.)  (Contributed by NM, 22-Nov-1994.) 

---

 Closure law for addition of complex numbers.  Axiom for real and complex numbers, justified by theorem ~ axaddcl .  Proofs should normally use ~ addcl instead, which asserts the same thing but follows our naming conventions for closures.  (New usage is discouraged.)  (Contributed by NM, 22-Nov-1994.)
statement: ax-addcl $p |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( A + B ) e. CC ) $.
